alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 6:54PM EDT until September 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Eastern Washington County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Unicoi County in east Tennessee... Southern Johnson County in east Tennessee... Carter County in east Tennessee... The south central City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 654 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Bristol Va to Elizabethton to near Erwin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Elizabethton, Erwin, Jonesborough, Central, Midway, Pine Crest and Hampton. This includes Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 16 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
